vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the Ammonites living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Ki.12.22;
son of: Shimeath (H8100); also called Zabad at 2Ch.24.26;
Another name of yo.za.khar (יוֹזָכָר "Jozacar" H3108)
§ Jozabad or Josabad = "Jehovah has endowed"
1) a Korhite Levite, 2nd son of Obededom, and one of the porters of the temple and of the storehouse there in the time of David
2) one of David's mighty warriors
3) another of David's mighty warriors
4) four other priests or Levites
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a) זָבָד   hijo de Simat; sirviente de Joás, rey de Judá; (b)   guerrero; tribu de Benjamín; en tiempos del rey David; (c)   guerreros; tribu de Manasés; en tiempos del rey David; (d)   levita; en tiempos del rey Ezequías; (e)   levita; en tiempos del rey Josías; (f)   varios hombres; post exílico
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
約撒拔 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "耶和華已賜與"
1) 大衛王時的一位哥轄的利未人, 俄別以東的次子, 負責看守聖幕及庫房的人之一
(代上 26:4;代下 31:13)
2) 大衛王的大能勇士之一 (代上 12:4)
3) 另兩位大衛的同名大能勇士 (代上 12:20)
4) 另外四位利未人的祭司 (拉 8:33;10:23;尼 8:7;11:16)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
约撒拔 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "耶和华已赐与"
1) 大卫王时的一位哥辖的利未人, 俄别以东的次子, 负责看守圣幕及库房的人之一
(代上 26:4;代下 31:13)
2) 大卫王的大能勇士之一 (代上 12:4)
3) 另两位大卫的同名大能勇士 (代上 12:20)
4) 另外四位利未人的祭司 (拉 8:33;10:23;尼 8:7;11:16)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.12.4
§ Jozabad or Josabad = "Jehovah has endowed"
1) a Korhite Levite, 2nd son of Obededom, and one of the porters of the temple and of the storehouse there in the time of David
2) one of David's mighty warriors
3) another of David's mighty warriors
4) four other priests or Levites
